```{r}
install.packages("boot")
library(boot)
```

```{r}
install.packages("bootstrap")
library(bootstrap)
```

```{r}
library(boot)

ratio <- function(d, w) sum(d$x * w)/sum(d$u * w)
mydata <- boot(city, ratio, R = 999, stype = "w")

mydata
```
```{r}
plot(mydata)
```

```{r}
library(boot)

x <- c(8.26, 6.33, 10.4, 5.27, 5.35, 5.61, 6.12, 6.19, 5.2, 7.01, 8.74, 7.78, 7.02, 6, 6.5, 5.8, 5.12, 7.41, 6.52, 6.21, 12.28, 5.6, 5.38, 6.6, 8.74)
print(x)
```

Membuat fungsi CV dgn sedikit modifikasi agar  dpt diolah oleh fungsi boot.
```{r}
CV <- function(x, id){
  xs <- x[id]
  sqrt(var(xs))/mean(xs)
}

CV
```

```{r}
CV(x)
```
```{r}
bootdata <- boot(data=x, CV, R=1000)

bootdata
```

Menampilkan selang kepercayaan dgn fungsi boot.ci.
```{r}
boot.ci(bootdata)
```

Nilai percentile ini mendekati hasil sebelumnya, yaitu 0.3092094 dan 0.1602328.

Terakhir, plot grafiknya dgn perintah.
```{r}
plot(bootdata)
```
